text: [Chapter 25b] [Sector 4, Shadow Realm Research Center]
It seems you vermin have managed to make it to the fourth sector.
Good thing it'll be your last.
Erghhh...
This isn't looking too good...
[Break flees from the lab]
[Proton opens a door and a loud alarm sounds]
...what was that?
Hello
Who are you?
I am Cayenne, a mechanical created by Death Pepper.

speaker: right
text: Death Pepper, the leader of this lab, awaits in the next sector.

speaker: right
text: But do not worry, I am not your enemy.

speaker: right
text: I can assist you in your battle against Death Pepper, if you would allow it.
[Recruit Cayenne] (Q) Recruit (W) Do not recruit

speaker: right
text: Okay then...
[Everyone stands in front of the enterance of the fifth sector]
Soon, the Itucher will be ours.
It's time to finally end this.
The final sector... that sounds a little intimidating...
It's been a long journey, but it's finally coming to an end...
After all of these years, we're ending this at the very place it started it...
For everyone who suffered...
For everyone who died...
We must win!
[Proton opens the door and everyone charges into the sector]
